metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1152 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
libjpeg-turbo 1.5.90 is vulnerable to a denial of service vulnerability caused by a divide by zero when processing a crafted BMP image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1152` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.4.2-0ubuntu3.1
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.4.2-0ubuntu3.1
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.4.2-0ubuntu3.1
libturbojpeg - 1.4.2-0ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.2-0ubuntu3.1').
